channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Northwestern University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: On Statistical Rates and Provably Efficient Criteria of Latent Diffusion Transformers (DiTs)
item.description: Latent Diffusion Transformers (DiTs) achieve almost-linear time training and inference through low-rank gradient approximations and efficient criteria, overcoming high dimensionality challenges.

item.title: Semantic Feature Learning for Universal Unsupervised Cross-Domain Retrieval
item.description: Universal Unsupervised Cross-Domain Retrieval (U2CDR) framework learns semantic features to enable accurate retrieval even when category spaces differ across domains.
